answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Below are a couple links to various revenue manuals:
Sandy, UT
http://sandy.utah.gov/government/finance-is/revenue-manual-and-fee-schedule.html 
Renton, WA
http://rentonwa.gov/government/default.aspx?id=2044 
Plano, TX
http://plano.gov/Budget/Pages/revenue.aspx 
Coral Springs, FL
http://www.coralsprings.org/publications/Budget_FY2005/RevenueManual2-05.pdf
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org

Thanks!

author: [Anonymous]
text:
Does anyone have a recent copy of their administration's Revenue Manual that I can use as a guide in drafting my own.
Thanks,
title: Revenue Manual
